thread.title: Manchester United Fans Unveil Savage New Banner Aimed At Steven Gerrard
thread.title_full: Manchester United Fans Unveil Savage New Banner Aimed At Steven Gerrard

title: Manchester United Fans Unveil Savage New Banner Aimed At Steven Gerrard
text:
Manchester United Fans Unveil Savage New Banner Aimed At Steven Gerrard Sat Feb 11 2017 14:57:24   14:57:24 GMT+0000 (GMT) Nasir Jabbar Nasir Jabbar in football 
Steven Gerrard is synonymous with a few things following his brilliant playing career; that night in Istanbul, being a Liverpool hero not to mention his infamous 'dab' at home to Chelsea. 
The Liverpool legend slipped as he let in Demba Ba to score in front of the Kop, eventually sealing a 2-nil victory, pretty much evaporating 'The Red's' chances of winning the Premier League. 
And three years on, it still remains in the forefront of the Manchester United faithfuls. Not only do they bellow out the Gerrard chant home and way but they've now unveiled a brand spanking new banner commemorating that moment. (Ba opens the scoring as a result from Gerrard's mistake.) (The skipper is dejected following Ba's goal.) 
As United seek to gain ground on their Merseyside rivals at home to Watford, they'll be doing so in front of a new banner which will be unfolded at Old Trafford. 
The banner depicts a picture of United duo Paul Pogba and Jesse Lingard performing the dab alongside Gerrard's 'version'. Check it out below: 
Brutal! 
What do you make of it? Funny or too much? 
Let us know in the comments section below. Sponsored Links
